subject: Football
lead_paragraph: DeMarcus Ware is the N.F.L. sacks leader, but he has an unusual blend of strength, agility and quickness that allows him to be a dominating force all over the field.
snippet: DeMarcus Ware is the N.F.L. sacks leader, but he has an unusual blend of strength, agility and quickness that allows him to be a dominating force all over the field.
